mapper.select: select mem_no, mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_mail, mem_addr, mem_point from members where mem_id = #{memId} and mem_pw = #{memPw}
mapper.insert: insert into members (mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_mail, mem_addr) values (#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memPhone}, #{memMail}, #{memAddr})
